title: National Capital Parks-East: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth            NACE Junior Ranger Book Want to become a Junior Ranger? Download our Junior Ranger book, have fun with the activities, and explore your parks.      Site Junior Ranger Books   Fort Circle Parks - East   Frederick Douglass NHS   Kenilworth Aquatic Garden        Climate Friendly and Anacostia Watershed Books The National Capital Parks-East,Climate Friendly, and Anacostia Watershed Jr. Ranger booklets were designed as a part of the Jr. Ranger Ambassador Program: a cooperation between the National Parks Service and the Student Conservation Association. This program was created to improve the Jr. Ranger experience in National Parks. Climate Friendly Anacostia Watershed
